instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-3437 Boots but doesn't do the 3 fan spins
threads.message: This board is working but it's not doing the 3 fan spinups when you first plug it in, it just spins up once and boots like a 2015 model. I attached some pre-ultrasonic cleaning pictures. Any ideas what might be causing that?

threads.title: 820-3437 Boots but doesn't do the 3 fan spins
threads.message:
"This board is working"
Does it really work, or just stays on?

You must check for corroded/broken traces and components with bad terminals.
You can also try new BIOS.
